movies.title: Gifted Hands: The Ben Carson Story
movies.plot: Gifted Hands: The Ben Carson Story is a movie based on the life story of world-renowned neurosurgeon Ben Carson from 1961 to 1987.
movies.awards: Nominated for 4 Primetime Emmys. Another 8 wins & 11 nominations.
